pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:1.11.1: [Kd 20:9.4.18](pli-tv-kd20:9.4.18) makes it clear how this is supposed to happen. A group of two or three nuns should approach the Sangha of monks and ask for the date of the observance day and for when to come for the instruction, if at all. The nuns are essentially finding out who is available for the instruction and when.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:2.4: For a discussion of the rendering “observance day (ceremony)” for _uposatha_, see Appendix I: Technical Terms.
